trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_SEQ_00<tab>Krile has a proposal to make.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sphene at leynode mnemo.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Clerk PX-0093.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Clerk PX-0093 again.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Krile.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>For our many meetings and partings, we have few enough opportunities to properly say our farewells. 'Twas pleasant to take the time for it.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_002<tab>Though I delight in companionship, solo journeys too have their appeal. And travel by sea <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> relaxing...

TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_003<tab>With Alisaie and Alphinaud spreading word of Alexandria, we shall soon have the chance to establish relations with other nations. I must make ready to treat with their leaders.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_SHALE_000_004<tab>I'm glad I got the chance to see him off. Cahciua would be glad, too.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_011<tab>If I may, I think it prudent to discuss our future plans elsewhere.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_012<tab>We are liable to hinder the dockworkers here if we linger.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_013<tab>Perhaps the beach would be a more appropriate venue.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>Outside of Alexandria, our knowledge of the Ninth is limited to the Storm Surge and passing mentions of Lindblum.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_022<tab>That being the case, a foray across the Mist Continent would be an invaluable opportunity for discovery.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_023<tab>Between the Ascians, the key, and the Milalla, there is much to be learned. Surely we can turn up a clue to one mystery or another.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_024<tab>Once conditions deteriorate past a certain point, an environment becomes anathema to life. Yet man is a resilient creature.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_025<tab>If there is a way to survive, then he will surely find it.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_026<tab>The mechanical soldiers won't hesitate to answer their queen. Let us hope they have useful information.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_SHALE_000_031<tab>Now that's settled, I'd best be off. I still need to check for decryption errors periodically, so I can only step away for so long.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_SHALE_000_032<tab>With luck, I'll have plenty to share the next time we meet.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_SHALE_000_033<tab>Until then!
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_034<tab>Let the rest of us make ready for a potential foray and meet at leynode mnemo.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab>The atmosphere is certainly less grim than when last I visited.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_042<tab>Though my mind knows better, I still feel uncomfortable around these mechanical soldiers...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_043<tab>Sphene has found us a suitable source of information, sparing you that duty for once.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_044<tab>Welcome to Living Memory, ally to Her Majesty! How may I help you?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_051<tab>This clerk has made itself available to answer our questions.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_052<tab>Clerk PX-0093, if one wished to descend to the surface from here, how would they typically do so?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_053<tab>Living Memory is currently detached from Everkeep, and is operating independently while supported by its aerial suspension systems.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_054<tab>Thus, both lift- and leynode-based transit is currently unavailable. I apologize for the inconvenience.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_055<tab>Despite its ability to remain aloft, perhaps Living Memory was never intended to function in this state indefinitely. If so, we're out of luck...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_056<tab>Not necessarily. Lifts and leynodes were likely the preferred modes of transportation, but that does not preclude the existence of others.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_057<tab>In the event of an emergency, how would we evacuate this facility?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_058<tab>Consulting emergency systems...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_100_058<tab>Living Memory's airship remains prepared to deploy should evacuation be necessary. Would Your Majesty like to appropriate it?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_059<tab>An airship!
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>Yes, please. As soon as is possible.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_061<tab>With Your Majesty's authorization, the vessel can be readied for launch without delay. Allow me a moment to execute the bypass protocols.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_071<tab>As I thought. Now, what awaits us below, I wonder?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_072<tab>It never occurred to me that there might be an airship here. How fortuitous!
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_073<tab>With an airship, a large number of Alexandrians could be evacuated at once, regardless of the situation below. An excellent contingency.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_074<tab>Though I am nervous about what we might find below, I am glad we found the means to get there.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_100_074<tab>As queen, I must bear witness to the truth, however terrible.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_081<tab>Safety tests have been successfully completed. Setting the Gate of Remembrance as initial destination...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_082<tab>Vessel is en route!
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_500<tab>Is that...<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> ship?
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_501<tab>It was purpose-built for Living Memory. However, it was modeled after the vessel Your Majesty used during the Storm Surge era.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_502<tab>A replica... Still, it does me good to see it.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_503<tab>I will deploy the gangway for boarding. This way, please.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_CLERKPX0093_000_504<tab>In order to reach the surface, we must pass through the storm clouds. I advise you to brace for turbulence!
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_510<tab>The ward Alisaie gave me is reacting...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_511<tab>Though not to the extent of the Thirteenth, the aetheric imbalance here is severe indeed.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_512<tab>It does serve to impress upon one the marvel of the barrier.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_513<tab>The lightning in Heritage Found is tame by comparison.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_514<tab>A land where levin reigns...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>The state of this reflection's aether is more dire than we anticipated.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_YSHTOLA_000_092<tab>I should be surprised if the Ascians had no hand in the war that wrought this.

TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_GRAHATIA_000_093<tab>The warding scale is truly a godssend for those of us without the blessing of Light. Remind me to send my profuse thanks to Vrtra and the Hannish alchemists once more.
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_094<tab>That crater...was once Alexandria...
TEXT_KINGMJ102_05427_KRILE_000_101<tab>A sobering sight, to say the least. But I shan't turn back now that we've come this far.
